debug._comment: for faster booting you can turn this off but if something doesnt work this could be because a module is outdated so its recommended to keep this on

protocol._comment: this isnt necessarily needed since you can just use nginx & cloudflare for ssl but i still provided it optionally

mysql._comment: Z is zulu time e.g. UTC or GMT, you usually dont wanna change it buy if you do want to, go ahead
mysql.__comment: if you get the error 'ER_NOT_SUPPORTED_AUTH_MODE' turn insecureAuth on, optionally you could modify your mysql setting or switch to ver5.1 but this is easier, for more info https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44946270/er-not-supported-auth-mode-mysql-server and https://github.com/fdl-stuff/nashi/issues/1
